body:
Hi guys,
Im totaly new in terms of grasshopper , and I just start working in this software. I have a problem regarding my Legend, each time when Im going to change a location of my legend I still have this orginall version. Have u any idea how could I remove it ?[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/K9K2PXYzbAsNKeiX9*-LElQ3r*1NpeixSPIr35dXpr*Vykr*aXzSzbJItgd*d37yFJVkruLnUlgykc6N*Iqw0PBhmVd8E*rb/Sun_path.jpg)

replies.body:
Hi Lukasz,

Right click on the main component and the Geo before Rotate and turn the preview to off for both of them.

Rotate component (and most of the other translate components) makes a copy of the original legend and rotates it. The original legend is also there as you can see. You need to turn off the preview not to see them otherwise it will show up in the canvas.

Mostapha
